select * from blog_content bc, blog_item1 bi1, blog_item2 bi2 where bc.is_deleted = bi1.is_deleted and bi1.is_deleted = bi2.is_deleted and bi2.is_deleted = 'no' and bc.login_id = bi1.login_id and bi1.login_id = bi2.login_id and bi2.login_id = #loginId# and bc.blog_date >= #startBlogDate# and bc.blog_date <= #engBlogDate# and bc.blog_item1_id = bi1.blog_item1_id and bc.blog_item2_id = bi2.blog_item2_id
bc.title like '%$title$%'
and bc.blog_type = #blogType#
and bc.blog_item1_id = #blogItem1Id#
and bc.blog_item2_id = #blogItem2Id#
order by bc.blog_date asc
